thread.title: Musician Stuff: Is D Minor Really The Saddest Key Of All Time? [News]
thread.title_full: Musician Stuff: Is D Minor Really The Saddest Key Of All Time? [News]

title: Musician Stuff: Is D Minor Really The Saddest Key Of All Time? [News]
text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 13 hours ago 17 Musician Adam Neely presented another interesting video discussion, this time around focusing on the key of D minor and its reputation of the saddest key ever.Adam dissected the whole thing rather thoroughly, summing up his thoughts in a concise 9-minute clip.Overall, the man concluded that "there are no discernible differences between keys in our modern tuning system... or maybe there are, but they're a little bit more subtle and maybe not as universal as you might think."You can check out the whole thing in the embedded player below.
